thread.title: Trump says federal government must do 'more with less'
thread.title_full: Trump says federal government must do 'more with less'

author: Getty Images
title: Trump says federal government must do 'more with less'

locations.name: roosevelt room of the white house

text:
Trump says federal government must do 'more with less' 58 Mins Ago Reuters SHARES 
President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he plans to make the U.S. government leaner and more accountable ahead of a meeting with key administration officials to discuss the federal budget. Getty Images President Donald Trump discusses the federal budget in the Roosevelt Room of the White House on February 22, 2017 in Washington, DC. 
"Unfortunately, the budget we're essentially inheriting is a mess. The finances of our country are a mess," Trump said at the start of a lunch meeting with Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin and Office of Management and Budget director Mick Mulvaney and other officials. 
Trump complained that the national debt had doubled over the last eight years. 
"We must do a lot more with less," Trump told reporters. 
Follow CNBC International on Twitter and Facebook .
